Broken.Result1: Falls unconscious for {rounds} rounds and awakens with {hp} HP
Broken.Result2b: Loss of an eye. Cannot act for {rounds} rounds and then can act with {hp} HP
Broken.Result3: Hemorrhage. Death in {hours} hours, unless treated. All tests are DR 16 in the first hour, then DR 18 in the last hour

Equipment.CarryingRulesPenalty: DR -2 after that. Impossible to carry more than
Equipment.WeaponsLimit: Weapons limit reached! Unequip a weapon before equipping another one.
Equipment.NoEquippedWeapons: No weapons equipped. Equip weapons in the Equipment tab.
Equipment.NoEquippedArmor: No armor equipped. Equip armor in the Equipment tab.
Equipment.ArmorLimit: Armor limit reached! Unequip current armor before equipping another one.
Equipment.ArmorDamaged: Damaged armor (current category is lower than maximum)
Equipment.CategoryExceedsMax: The selected category exceeds the maximum category for this armor!
Equipment.NoAmmoSelected: No ammunition selected, please select one before attacking

Encumbrance.MaxLoadExceeded: Cannot add this item. The maximum load limit ({max}) would be exceeded!

Rolls.CriticalDamageEffect: Critical Hit, x2 damage and enemy armor is reduced by 1 category!
Rolls.FumbleEffect: Critical Failure, weapon lost or damaged!
Rolls.DefenseCriticalEffect: Critical success! Make a free attack against your enemy.
Rolls.DefenseFumbleEffect: Critical failure! Take double damage and your armor is reduced by one category.
Rolls.DefensePenaltyWillBeAdded: will be added to final DR
Rolls.SwiftnessPenaltyWillBeAdded: will be added to final DR
Rolls.ParrySuccess: Parry successful! Counter-attack with your weapon!
Rolls.ParryFailure: Parry failed! You take damage from the enemy weapon!
Rolls.ParryFumbleEffect: Critical failure! Take double damage, your armor is reduced by one category, and your weapon is broken or lost!

GetBetter.Confirmation: Are you sure you want to get better?

Seppuku.ConfirmationText: Do you really want to commit seppuku?
Seppuku.AssistantText: Do you have an assistant to help you with the ritual?
Seppuku.RitualPreparation: You ritually prepare yourself and your surroundings, meditating on the reasons for your act and writing a death haiku.
Seppuku.SpiritFailureText: You failed to prepare your spirit and could not begin the ritual of Seppuku.
Seppuku.ResilienceSuccessText: You endure the pain and complete the ritual, and your Honor increases by:
Seppuku.ResilienceFailureAssistantText: You cannot endure the pain and your 'assistant' helps you, decapitating you to complete the ritual. Your Honor increases by:
Seppuku.ResilienceFailureNoAssistantText: You cannot endure the pain and do not complete the ritual. You suffer damage and must roll on the Debilitating Injuries table.
